head.supplied: ¶ The Society of Nature-investigating Friends of Berlin, in order to promote its purposes in the field of natural science, has elected in today's session Dr Ferdinand Mueller, Professor of Botany in ...

div.p: From the Gesellschaft naturforschender Freunde zu Berlin
RB MSS M200a.33, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Seal on lower centre of document inscribed around the margin 'Siegel der naturforschenden Gesellschaft in Berlin’ [Seal of the Society of Nature-investigating Friends in Berlin] In the centre a source of light shines above an open book inscribed ‘Natur’ [Nature], while below this is the date of the Society’s foundation, 1773.

p.seg: Die Gesellschaft naturforschender Freunde zu Berlin

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: hat zur Beförderung ihrer naturwissenschaftlichen Zwecke in der heutigen Sitzung

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: zu ihrem Ehren-Mitgliede gewählt und darüber gegenwärtiges Diplom ausfertigen lassen.

padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

div.p: The Society of Nature-investigating Friends of Berlin, in order to promote its purposes in the field of natural science, has elected in today's session Dr Ferdinand Mueller, Professor of Botany in Victoria as its honorary member, and accordingly has issued this diploma.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
